lead_paragraph: Striker Christian Benteke scored a stoppage-time winner as Crystal Palace came back from a two-goal deficit to beat Sunderland 3-2 in the Premier League after Jermain Defoe had given the hosts a two-goal lead on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Benteke Strikes Late as Palace Comeback Sinks Sunderland
headline.main: Benteke Strikes Late as Palace Comeback Sinks Sunderland

snippet: Striker Christian Benteke scored a stoppage-time winner as Crystal Palace came back from a two-goal deficit to beat Sunderland 3-2 in the Premier League after Jermain Defoe had given the hosts a two-goal lead on Saturday....
